select *,IFNULL(total_score,0) AS score from design_enroll_judges j left join ( select p.participant_id,sum(u.weight) as total_score from design_enroll_participants p left join sys_user u on p.judge_id=u.id group by participant_id )tmp on j.id=tmp.participant_id where 1=1
and j.real_name like CONCAT('%',#{realName},'%')
and j.top_recommend_status =#{topStatus}
order by score asc
order by score desc
